item.title: MIUI OS1.0.11.0.UKDINXM Fastboot update for Xiaomi 11T Pro India
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Xiaomi 11T Pro India

Codename: vili

Version: OS1.0.11.0.UKDINXM | 14.0

Size: 5.9 GB

MD5: 257a502911f51a50f7aeded1259aafee

Changelog:
[Highlights]
Optimization: Frame drops and stuttering issues in Honor of Kings
[System]
Optimization: System stability
Fix: Errors occurred in some cases
Updated the security patch to March 2025. Increased system security.

Download: Here
